trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived"></xref> event or <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived"> </xref> evento ou <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataReceivedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um delegado DataReceivedEventHandler, identifica o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously collect the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream output of a process, add your event handler to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: De forma assíncrona coletar o redirecionamento <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>ou <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>fluxo de saída de um processo, adicione o manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>ou <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived>evento.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: These events are raised each time the process writes a line to the corresponding redirected stream.
trans-unit.target: Esses eventos são gerados sempre que o processo grava uma linha para o fluxo redirecionado correspondente.

trans-unit.source: When the redirected stream is closed, a null line is sent to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Quando o fluxo redirecionado é fechado, uma linha nulo é enviada ao manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that your event handler checks for this condition before accessing the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos procura por esta condição antes de acessar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the `static` method <xref:System.String.IsNullOrEmpty%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to validate the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A> property in your event handler.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode usar o `static` método <xref:System.String.IsNullOrEmpty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para validar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A>propriedade em seu manipulador de eventos.</xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A> </xref:System.String.IsNullOrEmpty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
